message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $13,000. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am willing to pay $12,000 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $12,000 is too low for me.  Would you consider $12,750?
I understand your position, Alice. Let me see if I can make it work for $12,500.
